statements.statement: select * from TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION order by FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID

select * from TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID = '$FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.TABLE_NAME = '$TABLE_NAME$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_CODE = '$FIELD_CODE$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_VALUE = '$FIELD_VALUE$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION = '$DESCRIPTION$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_1 = '$ATTRIBUTE_1$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_2 = '$ATTRIBUTE_2$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_3 = '$ATTRIBUTE_3$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_4 = '$ATTRIBUTE_4$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_5 = '$ATTRIBUTE_5$'
order by FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID
select * from TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION where TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID = '$value$' order by FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID
select * from TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION where TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID = '$FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID$' order by FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID
statements.insert:
select TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESC_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION ( FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID , TABLE_NAME , FIELD_CODE , FIELD_VALUE , DESCRIPTION , ATTRIBUTE_1 , ATTRIBUTE_2 , ATTRIBUTE_3 , ATTRIBUTE_4 , ATTRIBUTE_5 ) values ( #ID# , #TABLE_NAME# , #FIELD_CODE# , #FIELD_VALUE# , #DESCRIPTION# , #ATTRIBUTE_1# , #ATTRIBUTE_2# , #ATTRIBUTE_3# , #ATTRIBUTE_4# , #ATTRIBUTE_5# )
statements.update: update TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION set TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# , FIELD_CODE = #FIELD_CODE# , FIELD_VALUE = #FIELD_VALUE# , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION# where FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID = '$FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID = '$FIELD_DESCRIPTION_ID$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.TABLE_NAME = '$TABLE_NAME$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_CODE = '$FIELD_CODE$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.FIELD_VALUE = '$FIELD_VALUE$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION = '$DESCRIPTION$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_1 = '$ATTRIBUTE_1$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_2 = '$ATTRIBUTE_2$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_3 = '$ATTRIBUTE_3$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_4 = '$ATTRIBUTE_4$'
TM_CATEGORY_FIELDDESCRIPTION.ATTRIBUTE_5 = '$ATTRIBUTE_5$'
